content.rendered:
ABOUT US

Eddy’s Barbershop Owner

Eddy’s Barbershop specializes in men’s haircuts, precision straight razor shaves, and expert beard trims. The team at Eddy’s Barbershop is committed to offering top-quality grooming services at competitive prices, ensuring each client leaves fully satisfied.

The shop is led by owner and master barber, Eddy (also known as Iyad), who brings over two decades of experience in the craft. After relocating to the Bay Area, Eddy began delivering sharp, stylish cuts to residents in 2016. By 2019, he proudly opened his shop near Burlingame Avenue in Burlingame, California. With a warm smile for every customer, Eddy is not only skilled and dedicated but also deeply passionate about providing personalized haircuts that meet each client’s unique preferences.

Who We Are
We offer a full range of premium grooming services

At Sublime Barbershop, combining great style, expert haircuts, and highly skilled barbers. Our mission is to recreate the classic barbershop experience with a modern touch, delivering exceptional craftsmanship and personalized service to ensure you always look and feel your absolute best.

Great Style. Great Haircuts. Awesome Barbers. Great Style. Great Haircuts. Awesome Barbers. Great Style. Great Haircuts. Awesome Barbers.

Meet the masterminds behind the chair

our team of skilled barbers is here to sculpt
your next look with precision and flair.

Signature Haircut

Our most popular service. The signature haircut includes detailed clippers, scissors, straight razor neck shave, shampoo, conditioner, and styling.

Full-service haircut and traditional straight razor line-up (with hot towel).
 
$85.00 ・ 1 hr

Hair Coloring Only - BROWN OR BLACK

$85.00 ・ 1 hr

Relaxer

$70.00 ・ 30 min
